title: Comrie, Bernard, 1981, The Languages of the Soviet Union
description:
Comrie, Bernard, 1981, The Languages of the Soviet Union (PDF-scan)

Hard to get, out of print, bloody expensive in used book stores. 

keywords: languages, grammar, turkic, mongolian, tungusic, tatar, buryat, orok, balto-finnic, lapp, volgaic, permic, ugric, samoyedic, estonian, khanty, selkup, slavonic, baltic, indo-iranian, indic, indo-aryan, armenian, iranian, germanic, romance, lithuanian, tadzhik, caucasian, georgian, abkhaz, avar, chukotko-kamchatkan, paleosiberian, eskimo-aleut, yukagir, yukaghir, ket, nivkh, aramaic, assyrian, dungan, chukchi
